title: Exclusive spacious 3-room apartment on the 14th floor of Pasteur's Tower
description:
Exclusive spacious 3-room apartment on the 14th floor of Pasteur's Tower, which is tallest residential building in Copenhagen, located in Carlsberg Byen close to Vesterbro, Frederiksberg and Valby. 

From previous tenants:
"We've thoroughly enjoyed living in Pasteur's Tower; the bright apartment with modern amenities, large windows with exceptional views of Copenhagen, and the south-facing balcony overlooking J.C. Jacobsen Garden have been an everyday joy. Carlsberg Byen's balance of modern architecture, green areas, and urban life is unparalleled, with everything you need within close proximity. We've been so charmed by the area that we've decided to make it our permanent neighborhood."

An ideal rental offer for the single, couple or small family who‚Äôs looking for an apartment in a central location with functional layout, a large open plan kitchen/living room area for entertainment, a large master bedroom and an extra room for an office or a guest/child room.

Layout
The 82 m¬≤ apartment has a very practical floor plan that uses every square meter. It starts with a specious entrance with an access to the bathroom, two bedrooms (Master Bedroom and smaller room ‚Äì V√¶relse) and the open plan kitchen combined with living room and a balcony.

Bathroom
The bathroom is equipped with a shower cabin, toilet, a built-in washbasin and washing column from Miele (washing machine, dryer).

Bedrooms
The bedrooms‚Äô windows are facing the East side with view over Vestrerbro and city center, and both are equipped with built-in closet space. 

Kitchen / Living room with Balcony
The open kitchen equipped with minimalist, Scandinavian design white furniture from HTH and appliances from Miele with an entrance to a functional, squared balcony with the view over the J.C. Jacobsen Park (J.C. Jacobsens Have). Kitchen appliances include: fridge, freezer, oven, dishwasher and stove. The open living room has plenty of space for a dining and living areas, while the floor to ceiling windows guarantee afantastic view over Copenhagen‚Äôs rooftops and parks while still being undisturbed. 

Location
The flat is located in new, popular and trendy district Carlsberg Byen in Pasteur's Tower, which is highest residential building in Copenhagen. Carlsberg byen is an area neighboring three districts: Vesterbro, Frederiksberg and Valby.

Facilities
Pasteur's Tower has direct access to all everyday necessities including grocery shopping, restaurants, and coffee shops, daycare, kindergarden and international school. Hotel, Spa, Zoo, Home of Carlsberg and fitness facilities are in walkable distance. There are also multiple green areas and beautiful parks in the neighbourhood, when walking in the South direction - J.C. Jacobsen Have (50 m) and Western Cemetery - Vestre Kirkeg√•rd (600 m) and Enghaveparken (600 m), S√∏ndermarken (700 meters) and Frederiksberg Have (1100 m) in the North direction.

Public Transport
Pasteur's Tower is located ca. 350 meters from Carlsberg train station (S-train) and ca. 1000 meters from Enghave Plads Metro Station (M3 Cityringen, circle line), thus the transportation to Copenhagen Central Station takes only 9 minutes.

Welcome to Hostrupsvej in the vibrant Frederiksberg/Vesterbro area, where city life is lived right outside your door. Here you will find an attractive home and at the same time a central base located in one of Copenhagen‚Äôs most sought-after and culturally exciting neighborhoods.
The apartment is located at the top of a classic and well-maintained property and offers a bright and functional floor plan and a view of the city‚Äôs rooftops. If you don‚Äôt want to take the stairs to the 5th floor, you can use the elevator that takes you directly to the apartment from where you also have access to your own private roof terrace. Here you can relax and at the same time enjoy the outdoors, spending time with family and friends while enjoying the panoramic view of the city. It is peaceful and undisturbed here, even though you live in the middle of the city.
Hostrupsvej is located at the crossroads between Frederiksberg‚Äôs quiet, green streets and Vesterbro‚Äôs lively cultural life. You are a few minutes‚Äô walk from the iconic ‚ÄúK√∏dbyen‚Äù (Meat packer district), which houses some of the city‚Äôs best restaurants, bars and creative industries. By day a mecca for gastronomy and galleries ‚Äì by night one of Copenhagen‚Äôs most popular nightlife spots.
Within a short distance you will also find V√¶rnedamsvej ‚Äì known as ‚ÄúLittle Paris‚Äù with delicatessens, specialty shops and cozy caf√©s. S√∏ndermarken and Frederiksberg Have ‚Äì Both public parks with perfect green breathing spaces for runs, picnics or walks in scenic surroundings. Det Ny Teater, VEGA (Concerthall) and Planetarium ‚Äì top-class cultural institutions, all within cycling distance.
There is easy access to public transport by metro, S-train and buses, which quickly connect you to the rest of the city.
A rare combination in one of the city‚Äôs most dynamic districts.

description:

description:
OBS! Billeder er fra pr√∏vebolig!

Ejendommen

Oase Husene er et str√•lende symbol p√• b√¶redygtig luksus centralt placeret i det nyligt udviklede, gr√∏nne hjerte af H√∏je Taastrup C.

Ejendommen er strategisk placeret ved indgangen til den frodige parkoase i det nye H√∏je Taastrup C-omr√•de, hvor bolig, arbejde og fritid smelter sammen i et harmonisk kvarter, skabt til at fremme en dynamisk bykultur. Disse boliger er designet til at opfylde behovene hos singler, familier og √¶ldre, der s√∏ger en komfortabel og seniorvenlig bolig.

Boligerne

Disse imponerende boliger udg√∏r et samfund p√• 157 enheder, sp√¶nder fra 59 til 109 kvadratmeter, hvoraf 30 er specielt designet med fokus p√• seniorvenlighed. I Oase Husene finder du en blanding af 2-, 3- og 4-v√¶relses lejligheder, alle elegant indrettet for at im√∏dekomme enhver livsstil. Alle boligerne er indrettet med l√¶kre kvalitetsk√∏kkener i en fantastisk farve som g√∏r boligerne helt unikke.

Omr√•det

Den vision√¶re tilgang til urban design, der pr√¶ger Oase Husene, er ikke blot et udtryk for b√¶redygtighed, men ogs√• en hyldest til f√¶llesskab og trivsel. Ved at tilbyde en bred vifte af faciliteter og gr√∏nne omr√•der skaber Oase Husene et milj√∏, der fremmer aktivitet og samv√¶r og im√∏dekommer forskellige livsstile og behov.

Fra de velindrettede boliger til de omkringliggende rekreative omr√•der er hver eneste detalje omhyggeligt t√¶nkt igennem for at sikre en h√∏j livskvalitet for alle beboere. Dette banebrydende boligprojekt repr√¶senterer et skridt mod en mere b√¶redygtig og inkluderende fremtid for byudviklingen i H√∏je Taastrup.

Der tages forbehold for fejl og evt. lejereguleringer.

description:

Den gennemg√•ende gr√∏nne linje skaber ikke blot et smukt milj√∏, men ogs√• funktionalitet og velv√¶re. For eksempel er tr√¶lamellerne og den gr√∏nne beplantning p√• den sydlige facade med til at danne uderum og skabe naturlig solafsk√¶rmning p√• altaner og terrasser. T√¶t om sommeren og let om vinteren.

Dine h√•rde hvidevarer er af m√¶rket Vestfrost, som leverer k√∏le-/fryseskab, opvaskemaskine, ovn og induktionskogeplade med 4 sektioner.

Den flotte keramiske h√•ndvask er placeret over stilrene Dansani-skabe med glatte, hvide overflader, der er lette for dig at vedligeholde. Der medf√∏lger ogs√• en vaskes√∏jle med vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumbler fra Vestfrost. Armaturer i h√•ndvask og bruseniche er fra Grohe.

Familieboligerne i Project Radio ligger i natursk√∏nne omgivelser p√• gr√¶nsen til K√∏benhavn, hvorfra du hurtigt kan ramme en supercykelsti. Omr√•det er yderst b√∏rnevenligt, og inden for f√• hundrede meter finder du bl.a. daginstitutionerne Solstr√•len, M√•nestr√•len og Mosen samt M√∏rkh√∏j Skole, Enghaveg√•rd Skole og Tingbjerg Skole.

Naturen omgiver dig p√• alle sider ‚Äì med Vejles√∏, Geelskov, Fures√∏, Sj√¶ls√∏ og flere skov- og stisystemer n√¶rmest lige uden for hovedd√∏ren. B√∏rnefamilier vil desuden gl√¶de sig over kort afstand til gode skoler som ‚ÄúHolte Skole (Dronningg√•rdskolen og Ny Holte Skole)‚Äù, trygge cykelstier og rigt fritidsliv i omr√•det. Holte er et omr√•de med sj√¶l og stil ‚Äì en velafbalanceret kombination af klassisk elegance og moderne bekvemmelighed.


Ejendommen:

Den oprindelige del af huset er opf√∏rt i 1946, mens en eksklusiv tilbygning fra 2005 ‚Äì tegnet af Hornb√¶kgruppen ‚Äì tilf√∏rer huset et arkitektonisk l√∏ft og g√∏r det til noget helt s√¶rligt. De forskudte plan skaber sp√¶ndende niveauer og tydelige zoner mellem voksenafdeling, b√∏rneafdeling og f√¶lles opholdsomr√•der ‚Äì perfekt til b√•de hverdagsliv og g√¶stebud. Den store, solrige grund er flot beplantet og danner en smuk og privat ramme om huset ‚Äì med terrasser hele vejen rundt, s√• solen kan f√∏lges fra morgen til aften.


Planl√∏sning:


Indbydende, m√∏blerbar entr√© med garderobeplads

F√• trin ned til imponerende opholdsstue med loft til kip, panoramaudsigt og udgang til terrasse og have


For√¶ldreafdeling:

Afsk√¶rmet voksenafdeling med stort sovev√¶relse, elegant skabsv√¶g fra gulv til loft, direkte udgang til terrasse samt adgang til nyt, luksuri√∏st badev√¶relse med stor bruseniche og gulvvarme.

B√∏rne-/ungdomsafdeling:
To lyse, rummelige v√¶relser med ovenlysvinduer, skabe og direkte udgang til haven fra det ene v√¶relse. V√¶relserne forbindes via en lille mellemgang med adgang til terrasse ‚Äì oplagt som legeomr√•de eller teenageafdeling.

Veludstyret bryggers med vaskes√∏jle og praktisk udgang. Fra bryggerset er der direkte og overd√¶kket adgang til et separat viktualierum, der fungerer ideelt som opbevaringsrum for kolonialvarer, vin og udstyr ‚Äì en luksus, der sj√¶ldent ses i moderne boliger.

Udend√∏rsfaciliteter:

Welcome to Vilhelm Hus in Carlsberg Byen! 
This is a beautiful, exclusive, and voluminous 6-room apartment of 132 m¬≤, featuring 2 bathrooms! description:

description:
Dortheahuset i K√∏benhavns Nordvestkvarter rummer  blandt andet um√∏blerede nyopf√∏rte Small Living boliger. ___________________________________

Dortheahuset in Copenhagen's North-West Quarter contains, among other things, unfurnished newly built Small Living homes. The apartments can be rented indefinitely, and you can also apply for housing benefit when you live in one of the apartments. If you are looking for a one-bedroom apartment close to a metro station and/or bus lines, you are welcome to contact us for a viewing. 
The apartment also includes a basement. 

In the building, there is a shared yard with benches to sit and enjoy the sun, shared laundry and a large and spacious roof terrace with sun all day.

description:

title: M√∏bleret liebhaverlejlighed med l√¶kker stil & natursk√∏nne omgivelser
description:
Velkommen til en unik mulighed for at bo p√• solsiden af Amager, hvor moderne komfort m√∏der natursk√∏nne omgivelser. Denne m√∏blerede lejlighed p√• 115 m2 tilbyder tre rummelige v√¶relser og er perfekt til dem, der s√∏ger en midlertidig bolig i K√∏benhavn. Med en tidsbegr√¶nset lejeperiode er den ideel for personer p√• arbejdsophold, udstationering eller dem, der venter p√• deres n√¶ste permanente hjem. Lejligheden er beliggende n√¶st-√∏verst i bygningen, hvilket sikrer en rolig atmosf√¶re uden st√∏j fra overboer. Den private parkeringsplads i p-k√¶lderen g√∏r det nemt at komme hjem efter en lang dag.

Et omr√•de fuld af ro

Lejligheden er udstyret med alle moderne faciliteter, herunder opvaskemaskine, komfur, k√∏leskab, vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumbler. Gulvvarme og fibernet sikrer en behagelig og problemfri hverdag. Den store altan giver mulighed for at nyde solopgangen om morgenen og solnedgangen om eftermiddagen. F√¶llesomr√•derne mellem de tre t√•rne er perfekte til afslapning og socialt samv√¶r. Omr√•det er ekstremt roligt og byder p√• en kunstigt anlagt strand, der ligger t√¶t p√•, samt nem adgang til indk√∏b, restauranter og caf√©er. Offentlig transport i form af havnebus og busser er ligeledes inden for kort afstand.

Nem adgang til Amager F√¶lled

Amager er kendt for sin unikke kombination af byliv og natur. Her kan du nyde gr√∏nne omr√•der og vandet, mens du stadig er t√¶t p√• K√∏benhavns centrum. Omr√•det er super centralt, men alligevel f√∏les det som en fredfyldt oase. Med metroen i n√¶rheden er det nemt at komme rundt i byen, og de mange rekreative muligheder g√∏r det til et attraktivt sted at bo.

- 115 m2 m√∏bleret lejlighed med 3 v√¶relser

- Moderne faciliteter: opvaskemaskine, vaskemaskine, t√∏rretumbler

title: Spacious, furnished apartment with lots of sunlight and park-view, south-facing balcony
description:
We will be spending some time abroad and are therefore renting out our beloved home. The apartment is a spacious 94 square meters, boasting two cozy bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen and dining area, a proper bathroom and a huge open living space with a south-facing balcony. As there is a park right outside the window, it feels very close to nature while still being central. The modern apartment complex also comes with a shared garden complete with new playground, a BBQ area, boules, and more. An elevator enables easy access whenever needed. This rental is perfect for two adults or a couple or a small family with one child. It is fully furnished incl. all key electrical appliances, fully equipped kitchen etc.

It is located just a short walk away from Frederiksberg Center and Valby. You'll have easy access to supermarkets and take-away options, making your daily life a breeze. It is also just a 15min bus or bike ride to the city center with an "A bus" just outside the door and only a few minutes walking distance from the closest S-train station.
  
We are looking for tenants for June and July this year, exact timing can be discussed

title: POSTBYEN, LEJEBOLIGER
description:
Nu kan du flytte ind i Postbyens t√•rne, og se K√∏benhavn fra oven.

Postbyens markante silhuet med sine fire runde t√•rne er allerede blevet et nyt vartegn for den centrale del af K√∏benhavn. I to af t√•rnene indrettes der 160 moderne lejeboliger, som nu udbydes til udlejning med indflytning i februar 2026. Lejlighederne varierer i st√∏rrelse fra to til syv v√¶relser og er alle udstyret med altan med udsigt til byens liv og Postbyens gr√∏nne oaser.

Boligerne og deres arkitektoniske fremtoning

Uanset om du lejer en 2-v√¶relses eller en 7-v√¶relses bolig i Postbyen, kommer du til at leve i et unikt og utraditionelt hjem, der byder p√• alt andet end kvadratiske rum. De cirkelrunde boligt√•rne skaber nemlig vinkler, snit og hj√∏rner, hvor man hver dag kan gl√¶des over at bo i et hjem, hvor v√¶gge, gulve og lofter ikke f√∏lger den traditionelle vinkeltrekant.
Boligt√•rnenes karakteristiske takkede facadeprofiler skaber nogle sp√¶ndende indvendige vinduesl√∏sninger med dybe nicher. Det giver en r√¶kke hyggelige kroge, hvor udsigten kan nydes med en pude i ryggen og byen for f√∏dderne.
Alle boliger er fork√¶let med muligheden for at sidde udenfor p√• sin egen, private altan, hvor udsigten tager vejret fra dig, jo h√∏jere du bor. En oplevelse, der f√∏rst slutter, n√•r elevatoren standser ved 28. etage i det h√∏jeste boligt√•rn.

Nordiske materialer og r√• kontraster
Tr√¶d ind i et hjem, hvor √¶stetik og funktionalitet g√•r h√•nd i h√•nd. Alle lejligheder i Postbyen er gennemt√¶nkt ned til mindste detalje med materialer, der emmer af varme og elegance. De lyse lamelplankegulve i natureg med gulvvarme l√∏ber i et ubrudt flow gennem rummene og binder boligen harmonisk sammen.
Med lofter og s√∏jler i beton opst√•r der en sp√¶ndende og r√• kontrast mellem det varme tr√¶ og den karakteristiske betonstruktur og tilf√∏rer boligen kant og karakter.

K√∏kkenalrummet har direkte adgang til altanen, hvor dagslyset str√∏mmer ind. Her m√∏der str√∏mlinet design fra Invita og corianbordplader de nyeste h√•rde hvidevarer i h√∏j kvalitet. Det enkle design skaber en rolig og stilfuld ramme, hvor udsigten f√•r lov at stj√¶le opm√¶rksomheden.

Badev√¶relserne videref√∏rer den enkle og eksklusive stil med smukke gr√• fliser, v√¶gh√¶ngte toiletter og en atmosf√¶re af diskret luksus.
Som en gennemt√¶nkt detalje er alle indvendige d√∏re udf√∏rt som indbyggede skyded√∏re, der b√•de er pladsbesparende og giver et enkelt udtryk mellem rummenes indbyrdes forhold.

F√¶lles¬≠faciliteter -
med himlen som n√¶rmeste nabo

M√•ske er i en r√¶kke naboer, der g√•r sammen om at booke en foredragsholder eller en yogainstrukt√∏r ‚Äì der kan v√¶re noget ret magisk over at lave en solhilsen med udsigt over byen, √òresund og hele vejen til Sverige.

title: POSTBYEN, LEJEBOLIGER
description:
Nu kan du flytte ind i Postbyens t√•rne, og se K√∏benhavn fra oven.

Postbyens markante silhuet med sine fire runde t√•rne er allerede blevet et nyt vartegn for den centrale del af K√∏benhavn. I to af t√•rnene indrettes der 160 moderne lejeboliger, som nu udbydes til udlejning med indflytning i februar 2026. Lejlighederne varierer i st√∏rrelse fra to til syv v√¶relser og er alle udstyret med altan med udsigt til byens liv og Postbyens gr√∏nne oaser.

I Postbyen bor du i et helt nyt levende bykvarter med hoteller, butikker, restauranter, caf√©er, og meget mere. Dit nye hjem ligger omgivet af smuk arkitektur, og nedenfor din hovedd√∏r ligger byparken, der gr√∏nt og frodigt snor sig gennem Postbyen. Fri for biler og med plads til mennesker.

Boligerne og deres arkitektoniske fremtoning

Uanset om du lejer en 2-v√¶relses eller en 7-v√¶relses bolig i Postbyen, kommer du til at leve i et unikt og utraditionelt hjem, der byder p√• alt andet end kvadratiske rum. De cirkelrunde boligt√•rne skaber nemlig vinkler, snit og hj√∏rner, hvor man hver dag kan gl√¶des over at bo i et hjem, hvor v√¶gge, gulve og lofter ikke f√∏lger den traditionelle vinkeltrekant.
Boligt√•rnenes karakteristiske takkede facadeprofiler skaber nogle sp√¶ndende indvendige vinduesl√∏sninger med dybe nicher. Det giver en r√¶kke hyggelige kroge, hvor udsigten kan nydes med en pude i ryggen og byen for f√∏dderne.
Alle boliger er fork√¶let med muligheden for at sidde udenfor p√• sin egen, private altan, hvor udsigten tager vejret fra dig, jo h√∏jere du bor. En oplevelse, der f√∏rst slutter, n√•r elevatoren standser ved 28. etage i det h√∏jeste boligt√•rn.

Nordiske materialer og r√• kontraster
Tr√¶d ind i et hjem, hvor √¶stetik og funktionalitet g√•r h√•nd i h√•nd. Alle lejligheder i Postbyen er gennemt√¶nkt ned til mindste detalje med materialer, der emmer af varme og elegance. De lyse lamelplankegulve i natureg med gulvvarme l√∏ber i et ubrudt flow gennem rummene og binder boligen harmonisk sammen.
Med lofter og s√∏jler i beton opst√•r der en sp√¶ndende og r√• kontrast mellem det varme tr√¶ og den karakteristiske betonstruktur og tilf√∏rer boligen kant og karakter.

K√∏kkenalrummet har direkte adgang til altanen, hvor dagslyset str√∏mmer ind. Her m√∏der str√∏mlinet design fra Invita og corianbordplader de nyeste h√•rde hvidevarer i h√∏j kvalitet. Det enkle design skaber en rolig og stilfuld ramme, hvor udsigten f√•r lov at stj√¶le opm√¶rksomheden.

Badev√¶relserne videref√∏rer den enkle og eksklusive stil med smukke gr√• fliser, v√¶gh√¶ngte toiletter og en atmosf√¶re af diskret luksus.
Som en gennemt√¶nkt detalje er alle indvendige d√∏re udf√∏rt som indbyggede skyded√∏re, der b√•de er pladsbesparende og giver et enkelt udtryk mellem rummenes indbyrdes forhold.

F√¶lles¬≠faciliteter -
med himlen som n√¶rmeste nabo
√òverst oppe i begge boligt√•rne er der skabt rum for to imponerende f√¶llesrum, hvor du som lejer kan booke dig ind til at afholde arrangementer, f√∏dselsdage eller barned√•ben. M√•ske er i en r√¶kke naboer, der g√•r sammen om at booke en foredragsholder eller en yogainstrukt√∏r ‚Äì der kan v√¶re noget ret magisk over at lave en solhilsen med udsigt over byen, √òresund og hele vejen til Sverige.

 * Husdyr er ikke tilladt
 * Rygning er ikke tilladt
 * Det er ikke tilladt at st√• i RKI el.lign.
 * Der er mulighed for tilk√∏b af parkering
 * Alle boliger har gulvvarme og k√∏ling

title: Townhouse lejlighed i 2-plan med stor privat tagterrasse
description:
Sk√∏n lejlighed p√• 166 kvm med v√¶relser i stueplan og f√¶lles opholdsrum p√• 1 salen + 43 kvm tagterrasse, hvor  i kan nyde solen i fred og ro. I befinder jer p√• K√∏benhavns attraktive havnefront - Sluseholmen. Omr√•det har ideel placering, om du arbejder i eller udenfor byen. 

Lejligheden indeholder: Rummelig entr√© med trappe til 1 salen, 3 gode v√¶relser samt badev√¶relse med brus og vaskefaciliteter. 1 salen byder g√¶stetoilet, kontor afdeling samt p√• et  stort k√∏kken-alrum ifm. med stuen, Her er en ekstra loftsh√∏jde (ca. 5 m) og vinduer fra gulv til loft, der giver et fantastisk lysindfald samt en god udsigt over kanalerne og havneindl√∏bet.
P-plads med mulighed for Clever ellader i k√¶lderen samt b√•dplads kan tillejes.
Tilleje i 3-4 √•r

Her er kort afstand til motorvej & lufthavn, f√• minutter til S-tog og indre City er blot et lille kvarter v√¶k. Omr√•det er kendetegnet ved de mange kanaler, slusen og havnel√∏bet der sammen med de mange sm√• b√•dklubber samt havnebadet giver en sk√∏n maritim stemning. INFO : I 2024 kommet den nye metro M4, som k√∏rer direkte til Orientkat i Nordhavn (CIS), hvor det n√¶rmeste stop er blot 5 min. p√• g√•ben fra lejligheden, som g√∏r det endnu lettere at komme ind til centrum.

2-storey townhouse apartment with large private roof terrace for rent for 3-4 years.
This apartment offers 166 sqm with rooms on the ground floor and living space on the first floor + 43 sqm roof terrace where you can enjoy the sun in peace and quiet. You are located on Copenhagen's attractive harbour front - Sluseholmen. The area is ideally located whether you work in or outside the city. 
The apartment contains: Spacious entrance hall with stairs to the first floor, 3 good bedrooms and a bathroom with shower and laundry facilities. The 1st floor offers a guest toilet, office area and a large kitchen-dining room in connection with the living room. Here there is an extra ceiling height (approx. 5 m) and floor-to-ceiling windows that provide fantastic light and a good view of the canals and the harbour.
Parking space with the possibility of Clever electric charger in the basement and a boat mooring can be rented.
There is a short distance to the motorway & airport, a few minutes to the S-train and the inner city is just a short block away. The area is characterised by the many canals, the lock and the harbour circuit, which together with the many small boat clubs and the harbour baths create a wonderful maritime atmosphere. INFO : In 2024, the new metro M4 had arrived, running directly to Orientkat in Nordhavn (CIS), with the nearest stop just a 5-minute walk from the apartment. on foot from the apartment, making it even easier to get into the city centre.

title: Charmerende vilalejlighed med egen have og br√¶ndeovn, 200m fra Husum station
description:
üî∂ 3 v√¶relser - 95 m¬≤ - Br√∏nsh√∏j üî∂ Hyggelig stor lejlighed med tre v√¶relser, k√∏kken, badev√¶relse, br√¶ndeovn og egen have.

----- ENGLISH BELOW -----

Lejligheden har en unik beliggenhed t√¶t p√• de virkelig flotte gr√∏nne omr√•der Utterslev Mose og Kagsmose. Den ligger t√¶t p√• indk√∏bssteder p√• Frederikssundsvej og hyggelige caf√©er og spisesteder omkring Husum. 
Den ligger ogs√• kun 4 min v√¶k fra Husum station, hvor man med S-tog kan tage til central K√∏benhavn i kun 23 minutter. Toget k√∏rer hver 10 minutter p√• hverdage. 

Lejligheden er p√• 95 kvm. og er utrolig godt indrettet. 
Der er bryggers ved indgangen med vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumber, der kan benyttes i lejeperioden uden mereomkstninger. 
P√• f√∏rste sal er der k√∏kken med udstyr og direkte adgang til en stor stue med br√¶ndeovn, der g√∏r stedet meget hyggelig. Der er ogs√• en stor og flot balkon, mens der kommer meget dagslys til stuen fra de to store altand√∏re.  
P√• den anden side er der to fine sovev√¶relser samt flot toilet med brusekabine og h√•ndvask.

Til sidst tilh√∏rer en virkelig flot have lejligheden, hvor man kan nyde det gode vejr og kreative aktiviteter som havepasning. Der er ogs√• et stort opbevaringsrum. 

Aconto bel√∏b d√¶kker over vand. Elforbrug afregnes s√¶rkilt. Der kr√¶ves 3 m√•neds depositum og 3 m√•neds forudbetalt husleje.

----- ENGLISH -----

The apartment has a unique location, 200 meters from Husum Station, and also walking distance to two of the best parks in Copenhagen area, Utterslev Mose and Kagsmose.

In the area you can find several restaurants and caf√©s. The center of the city is 23 minutes away by S-train, which runs every 10 minutes during weekdays.

The apartment is 95 sqm. and ideally distributed. It has its own entrance, where you will find the laundry room, exclusive to the apartment. Up the stairs, one arrives at fully equiped kitchen.
Next to it, there is a spacious living room with a fireplace, and a large covered balcony with sliding doors that illuminate the entire room.
On the other side there is a roomy bathroom, with vanity and shower. Finally, there are two spacious carpeted bedrooms overlooking the side and front yards.
Outside in the garden, one can enjoy the outdoors and practice some gardening. There is also a generous storage room.

The utilities payment is for water. Electricity is billed directly by the provider. A deposit of 3 months and 3 months prepaid rent is required.

title: Furnished Studio in Lyngby, Greater Copenhagen
description:
Hi,
My name is Nermin, and I am a scientist. I am leaving town for six months from July to December 2025 for a research fellowship. I am subleasing my studio to an adult student, PhD, or postdoc fellow in Lyngby, Greater Copenhagen. The Studio has everything you need daily. It's for one person and a couple of minutes' walk from Sorgenfri Station. The place is so close to DTU that you can cycle or walk to your school. Please note that this studio is eligible for the Student Grant and Housing Subsidy.

Rent: 7700 
utilities: 1000 DKK (all inclusive internet, electricity, water, and heating).
Three-month deposit
Period: July to December.
You can register CPR.

Please note that the building company settles the monthly utility payment (1000 DKK) each year. I usually get some money back, so you should expect some of this amount back by April 2026 (when I get cash back from the company).

I will leave the key with a friend, so if you can not show up on July 1st, you can pick it up later from him.
I am also flexible, so if you have exams and want some flexibility, I can consider leaving or extending your stay into January 2026. 

In the Studio, you will have your bathroom and kitchenette with a fridge and stove, as well as plenty of space and storage. You can also access a huge communal kitchen with extra storage space, stoves, ovens, and freezers. 

There is access to diverse facilities, including 24/7 laundry facilities with payment.

There are also free facilities, including: 
- 24/7 gym
- Rooftop with a fantastic landscape and overlook stations
- Extra study rooms and areas
- Cinemas
- Superfast Wi Fi
- Social and sports events
- 24/7 Security and a campus body to contact in any emergency, even late nights or early mornings. 
- Large roof terrace with gardens and terraces to enjoy
- parties and lots of other fun activities 
- Free maintenance for common issues (e.g., drainage system blockage, changing light bulbs, etc.) 

Best,
Nermin

description:
Boligen: 

Unik 2-v√¶relses lejlighed i det ikoniske A-huset ‚Äì en bolig, der b√•de emmer af moderne design og praktisk funktionalitet. Boligen √•bner op til et stort, indbydende k√∏kken-alrum. Her skaber de store vinduespartier masser af naturligt lys, og det dejlige kig til vandet byder p√• gode stunder - perfekt sted til b√•de morgenkaffe og afslapning.

Alrummet giver god plads til b√•de spisebord og sofaarrangement, og et rummeligt v√¶relse bag New Yorker v√¶ggen, giver fin plads til sovev√¶relset . Det store, moderne badev√¶relse er lyst og stilrent med fliser og vaskes√∏jle ‚Äì praktisk og indbydende.

Her f√•r du en bolig, hvor b√•de funktionalitet og √¶stetik g√•r h√•nd i h√•nd, og hvor der er rig mulighed for at s√¶tte dit personlige pr√¶g p√• indretningen. Et urbant hjem med masser af potentiale til at blive dit dr√∏mmefristed.

 

Ejendommen: 

A-huset er opf√∏rt i 1960 og blev ombygget til boliger i 2010. Med sin str√∏mlinede form og minimalistiske design, pr√¶senterer A-huset et billede af elegance og raffinement. Facaden er pr√¶get af store glasflader, der tillader naturligt lys at str√∏mme ind i boligerne og skaber et varmt og indbydende milj√∏. 

Den ikoniske A-formede bygning byder p√• gode f√¶lles faciliteter, heriblandt et dejligt g√•rdmilj√∏, et privat fitnesscenter for ejendommens beboere. Ejendommen byder p√• flere tagterrasser, hvorfra der er en fantastisk udsigt til vand og ind mod centrum af K√∏benhavn. description:
‚Äì See English version below ‚Äì

Nu udlejes en elegant og veldisponeret 2-v√¶relses lejlighed p√• 66 m¬≤, beliggende p√• 2. sal i det prisbel√∏nnede byggeri tegnet af Vilhelm Lauritzen Arkitekter. Lejligheden n√•s nemt via b√•de elevator og trappe og ligger i rolige omgivelser. Indvendigt er der t√¶nkt p√• kvalitet i alle detaljer ‚Äì fra det smukke egetr√¶sgulv til k√∏kken og h√•rde hvidevarer i topklasse.

Fra stuen er der adgang til den store, murede altan via to udgange. Her kan du nyde morgensolen og de sene aftentimer med udsigt til kanalen og lyden af vandets rolige bev√¶gelser.

Sovev√¶relset er indrettet med en stor kontinentalseng (180x210 cm) og et rummeligt gulv-til-loft kl√¶deskab. Der er installeret m√∏rkl√¶gningsgardiner med kassette og sidelister, som effektivt blokerer for lyset og sikrer en rolig nattes√∏vn. Fra vinduet er der direkte udsigt til den omgivende kanal. Kronl√∏bs√∏en byder p√• et unikt, bilfrit g√•rdmilj√∏ med gr√∏n beplantning og tr√¶er ‚Äì perfekt til afslapning. Now available for rent. An elegant and well-designed 2-room apartment of 66 m¬≤, located on the 2nd floor of the award-winning development designed by Vilhelm Lauritzen Architects. Completed in the autumn of 2023, the building draws inspiration from Denmark‚Äôs chalk cliffs at Stevns Klint ‚Äì a modern and natural addition to the surroundings.

The apartment is easily accessible by both elevator and stairs and is situated in peaceful surroundings. Inside, no detail has been overlooked ‚Äì from the beautiful oak flooring to the high-quality kitchen and top-of-the-line appliances.

You enter through a spacious hallway with plenty of storage and a large built-in wardrobe. From here, there's access to the bathroom, equipped with a wall-hung toilet, rain shower, and a laundry column with both washing machine and dryer.

The kitchen is custom-made by Kustomhouse, featuring exquisite joinery and includes all major appliances: refrigerator, freezer, dishwasher, oven, and stove. All kitchenware is included.

The living room is the heart of the home ‚Äì bright and welcoming with four large windows and thoughtfully arranged with zones for working, dining, and relaxing. From the living room, there is access to the spacious brick balcony through two separate doors. Here, you can enjoy the morning sun and peaceful evenings with direct views of the canal and the gentle sound of the water.

The bedroom features a large continental bed (180x210 cm) and a generous floor-to-ceiling wardrobe. Blackout blinds with cassettes and side rails ensure light reduction for a restful night's sleep. The window offers a calming view of the canal that surrounds the building. A private basement storage room is also included with the apartment.

Kronl√∏bs√∏en offers a unique, car-free courtyard with trees and lush greenery ‚Äì the perfect place to unwind. Residents have access to the Sauna House just outside the building, and a fully equipped gym will be available free of charge in 2025. The building also includes a four-level underground parking garage and secure bicycle storage.

title: Nybygget/central placeret 3 v√¶r med vestvendt altan
description:
Med disse nybyggede 3 v√¶r f√•r du en lejlighed centralt placeret i Carlsberg byen, og hvor boligens kvadratmeter er optimerede. Som beboer er du t√¶t p√• fredede bygninger og Carlsberg Byens st√∏rste park, J.C Jacobsens Have. Samtidig har du det aktive byliv lige uden for d√∏ren og en moderne og lys lejlighed. 
Lejlighederne har indbygget kl√¶deskabe samt alt i h√•rde hvidevarer (vaskemaskine, t√∏rretumbler, k√∏le-fryseskab, opvaskemaskine og ovn). Ligeledes er der et tilh√∏rende opbevaringsrum i k√¶lderen, samt en dejlig vestvendt altan.
Der er ligeledes masser af indk√∏bsmuligheder i form af F√∏tex, Netto og samtidig findes der mange spisesteder som Lagkagehuset, Gasolin Grill, Burger Shack og forskellige vinbarer/restauranter.

Uanset hvilken transportsform du foretr√¶kker, kommer du nemt til og fra Carlsberg Byen. S-toget k√∏rer fra Carlsberg Station, og den nye M3 Cityringen har metrostation b√•de p√• Enghave Plads og Frederiksberg All√®. Bussen fanger du lige ude p√• Pile All√® eller Ny Carlsberg Vej. 
Det er muligt at leje parkeringsplads i et af Carlsberg Byens p-anl√¶g. 

Mulighed for at flytte ind fra den 10. juni, f√∏rste husleje starter fra den 1. juli.

title: Unique furnished apartment in the heart of Copenhagen
description:
The apartment is available from July 14 for a one-year lease, with possibility of extension.

We are looking for a single person or a couple. It is not suitable for families or sharing, and pets are not allowed.

This three-room corner apartment is located in a rare building in old town Copenhagen with a spectacular view of the historical Nikolaj Church. The apartment has the full corner of the building and is situated on the 3rd floor allowing plenty of light from six windows facing the street and two windows facing the rooftops and Parliament building. The fully equipped kitchen and bathroom are newly renovated. The large and bright living room features an old fireplace, inbuilt shelves, a desk, a solid oak wood table with space for six people, a two-seater sofa, and chairs from &tradition. All furniture and lighting are high-quality contemporary design. The kitchen is equipped with a Dishwasher, oven, washing machine, microwave oven, and the apartment has a lot of inbuilt storage space. The bedroom has a tall double bed and a closet fitting-room style. The middle room is an 18th-century service hall remade as a guest room with a daybed. 

We are a Swedish/Danish couple renting out the Apartment on a long term basis because we are living in New York. You can visit the apartment by contacting us here.

description:
Velkommen til Midgaard!
Velkommen til MIDGAARD
MIDGAARD er et moderne bof√¶llesskab i √òrestaden med 206 l√¶kre studios med eget k√∏kken og bad. Boligerne byder p√• et lille kompakt k√∏kken med det, du typisk bruger i hverdagen: kogeplade, emh√¶tte og et k√∏leskab med fryseboks. Lejlighederne er indrettet med integrerede skabe.

MIDGAARD ligger p√• Else Alfelts Vej ud til Promenaden langs F√¶lleden, som er forbeholdt g√•ende og cykler. Byens Hus, der skal v√¶re f√¶lleshus med mange faciliteter for hele omr√•det, ligger lige ved siden af. N√¶rmeste indk√∏b og Metro station ligger 500 meter fra ejendommen.

Welcome to MIDGAARD
MIDGAARD ‚Äã‚Äãis a co-living community in √òrestaden, Copenhagen with 206 studio apartments, where you get your own kitchen and bathroom. The apartments offer a small compact kitchen with included kitchen essentials incl. stove, extractor hood and a small fridge with freezer compartment. The apartments are not furnished but do have integrated closets for clothes and storage.
The property offers great communal facilities. Among other things; common kitchen, laundry room and a big rooftop terrace with a fantastic view of F√¶lleden.
MIDGAARD ‚Äã‚Äãis located on Else Alfelts Vej next to the Promenade along F√¶lleden, which is reserved for pedestrians and cyclists. ‚ÄúByens Hus‚Äù, which is to be a community center with many facilities for the whole area, is right next door. The nearest supermarket and Metro station is 500 meters from the property.
In MIDGAARD you live close to the city, and yet you can enjoy the nature from the rooftop terrace and in the nearby area. You can go to the local caf√©s, or you can go for a run in green surroundings.
The fine print:
- You are not allowed to be registered in RKI

Historic charm and modern comfort in the heart of Copenhagen

This apartment on Gammel Strand 3. floor in Copenhagen is an impressive 182 m¬≤ home that combines historic charm with modern conveniences. title: Bright & fully furnished flat on Islandsbrygge!
description:
Hello future tenant. If you're looking for a modern and cozy flat in the heart of Copenhagen, look no further! This newly renovated apartment has an AMAZING location only a few blocks from the waterfront and Islandsbrygge metro station.

FURNITURE: The flat comes FULLY FURNISHED with a queen-sized bed, 2 SMART TVs, 2 leather couches, a work desk, ample closet space and a dining table. Basic amenities such as dishes, cutlery, lamps, mirrors, chairs, etc. are also included. The apartment has a nice newly constructed balcony and is situated on the 3rd floor. The building has an elevator and a shared wash-room in the basement which is very reasonably priced. 

THE AREA: Islandsbrygge is an extremely safe and popular part of Copenhagen to live in. The apartment is located in the "cozy area" with heaps of local shops, boutiques and grocery stores in the neighborhood. The waterfront - which is a popular spot to enjoy the sun, jump in the water, play sports, bar-BQ on the grass, etc, - is located only a block away from the apartment. Close by is Langebro connecting you to the city center with Tivoli, City hall, Central Train station and the main Shopping street. All of which is only a 5-10 min bike ride away.

AVAILABILITY: The apartment is available for move-in from the 1 of July, 2025.

THE IDEAL TENANT: I'm looking for someone who is clean, honest, has a stable income and will treat the apartment and its neighbors respectfully.¬†The flat is NOT suited for friends to share, however, a couple would be fine (this would be subject to an additional 850 kr./month to cover increased expenditures of water, electricity, wear & tear, etc.).

VIEWING: If you are interested in a viewing, please contact me with a bit of info about yourself (including: occupation, nationality, desired move-in date, etc) and I will reach out ASAP. 

Thanks for your interest, I look forward to hearing from you.
- Chresten

title: Dejlig 2 v√¶r. med terrasse ud til det gr√∏nne g√•rdrum
description:
Om boligen: 

Denne moderne og optimerede lejlighed byder dig f√∏rst velkommen i en entr√© med skabe til opbevaring af overt√∏jet. 

Fra entr√©en tr√¶der du ind i det lyse, √•bne k√∏kken-alrum, hvor det elegante, hvide Invita-k√∏kken st√•r i flot kontrast til de varme egetr√¶sparketgulve med gulvvarme. K√∏kkenet er udstyret med alt i moderne h√•rde hvidevarer, herunder kogeplade, k√∏le-/fryseskab, indbygningsovn og opvaskemaskine. 

Det lyse alrum giver masser af muligheder for at indrette en spiseafdeling i forl√¶ngelse af k√∏kkenet samt et hyggeligt stueomr√•de. Fra alrummet er der direkte adgang til en dejlig terrasse, hvor du kan nyde solen og det gode vejr med et glas koldt at drikke eller en varm kop kaffe. 

Sovev√¶relset er rummeligt, med indbyggede skabe og giver god plads til b√•de seng og opbevaring. I forl√¶ngelse af sovev√¶relset ligger lejlighedens depotrum, med ekstra plads til opbevaring. 

Badev√¶relset er indrettet med flotte, store gr√• fliser og en separat bruseniche. Der er naturligvis ogs√• plads til vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumbler. 

Ejendommen: 

Solhusene er en arkitektonisk perle, hvor bygningernes varierende h√∏jder elegant skr√•ner mod en charmerende, gr√∏n g√•rdhave. Ejendommen er tegnet af arkitektfirmaet Mangor & Nagel og byder p√• 88 unikke boliger, der alle emmer af lys og luft. 

I hjertet af g√•rdhaven, mellem de to bebyggelser, finder du et idyllisk orangeri ‚Äì et sk√∏nt samlingspunkt, der er skabt med henblik p√• at fremme f√¶llesskab, trivsel og gode stunder blandt beboerne. Her er plads til b√•de afslapning og sociale oplevelser. 

Der er parkeringsk√¶lder under ejendommen, hvor man har mulighed for at leje en p-plads. 

Solhusene st√•r til at blive DGNB guld-certificeret. Det er din garanti for at flytte ind i en ejendom, hvor der er t√¶nkt p√• milj√∏et samt din sundhed og trivsel. Her er blandt andet anvendt milj√∏venlige materialer og s√∏rget for et godt indeklima.

Omr√•det: 

Boligerne i Solhusene ligger praktisk byn√¶rt, men med naturen og gr√∏nne omgivelser lige i n√¶rheden. Her f√•r du en nem og praktisk hverdag, med kort afstand til b√•de skole, daginstitutioner, offentlig transport og indk√∏bsmuligheder. Blandt andet ligger n√¶rmeste supermarked lige rundt om hj√∏rnet i nabobygningen. Tilmed ligger tilk√∏rslen til Hiller√∏dmotorvejen blot ca. 2 minutters k√∏rsels v√¶k, s√• du er dermed godt forbundet til det hele, uanset om det er med bilen eller S-toget du skal afsted. This apartment is a fantastic match for many wishes!

- Beach: Only a 10-minute bike ride to Svanem√∏llen Beach and a 20-minute bike ride to Amager Strandpark (or take the metro from √òsterport st.)

Furthermore, the apartment offers two very nice bedrooms, both bright with built-in wardrobes, as well as a nice bathroom with Zanussi washing machine and tumble dryer. The apartment has a nice oak plank floor.

The apartment is centrally located on Islands Brygge, one of the capital's most attractive districts with delicious delicatessen and specialty shops, cafes and eateries. From Weidekampsgade it is walking distance to the Inner City and Christianshavn, and the nearest metro is a few hundred meters away. description:

Depotrummet er t√¶nkt ind i boligernes kvadratmeter, enten i form af et skab eller mindre rum, som du kan forvandle til dit eget walk-in-closet.

### Sk√∏nne uderum

Alle boliger har egen altan eller terrasse, der vender ind mod bygningens gr√∏nne hjerte: G√•rdrummet, hvor du kan skabe et sk√∏nt uderum i boligen med hyggelige m√∏bler, puder og krukker. Samt nyde aftensolen eller et godt m√•ltid mad.

### Her er t√¶nkt p√• alt

description:
We are renting out our newly modernized, fully furnished apartment for 4 months, starting from 1st of November 2025 and ending 28th of February 2026. 
The apartment has a combined living-room/kitchen with large windows with lots of natural light and sky view, including a small balcony. In the afternoon you have beautiful sunsets and natural light.
The kitchen is equipped with all the utensils you need for cooking at home, including a dishwasher.
Wi-Fi is included and available for everyone living in the building block.
Together with our friendly neighbors we share two roof-top terraces (one on each building) that are accessible all year round. There are also laundromats in the basement which can be used for a small fee.
The apartment is located in close proximity to 4 supermarkets, well-kept green areas and various restaurant and caf√© areas in the neighborhood. It‚Äôs also well-located to reach Frederiksberg, Assistens Kirkeg√•rd, the lakes (Peblinge S√∏) and the center of Copenhagen, and has very easy access to public transport (bus and metro).
Electricity, gas and heating is included in the price. However, to avoid excessive use there will be an upper limit based on our own expenses, but somewhat above this limit.
We are looking for responsible people to take care of our apartment while we are away.

The apartment will be rented out 1 month at a time with the possibility of extension. The apartment is undersold and you must be open to working with the real estate agent and keeping it neat for viewing.

Rent is 13.000 dkr. plus heat/water every month (Electricity, you will be connect yourself so it will be direct). Deposit is 13.000 dkr. and if you of course treat the apartment nice you will get all money back (I have references here from earlier renters). Price is including Internet and please note there is no TV, but you are welcome bring one.

Hope you like the design of funishing and check out the area. There are busses close and 25 minutes to center of Cph.

*washing machine and drying tumbler in basement.

Kristian K.

English:
Large, lovely 3-room residence with 2 spacious rooms, a living room connected to an open kitchen, a beautiful bathroom, and a large, south-facing balcony with a fantastic view.

The apartment is located on the 3rd floor at the corner/gable of a modern property centrally on Islands Brygge. It is well distanced from all neighbors and has a lovely view of a green wedge, plenty of sky, and the water of Copenhagen's canals while being set back enough that the lively atmosphere of Brygge does not disturb.

Upon entering the apartment, you step into a spacious hallway with room for outerwear. From there, you have access to a large living area that serves as both a dining and living room. The kitchen is in open connection with the living area and is equipped with a large kitchen island and all necessary appliances. From the living area, there is direct access to a large, covered balcony with furniture and a view of a green area and water. The apartment has two bedrooms; one with built-in closets and both furnished with a bed or sofa bed. The bathroom is large and spacious, tiled with two separate sinks, cabinet space, and a separate shower niche and washing facilities.

G√•rdrum og f√¶llesskab:

Praktisk:
Derudover f√•r du:
- Elevator i bygningen

The apartment is close to Town Hall Square, Str√∏get, which means that all necessities are within walking distance.

The apartment itself is located on Vestergade on the 2nd floor. Vestergade is known as one of Copenhagen's liveliest streets.

The apartment consists of two rooms of 21 sqm, a smaller room 15 sqm, a kitchen of about 8 sqm and a bathroom 5 sqm, which totals to 64 sqm. title: HELT ny 2-v√¶relses med k√¶mpe tagterrasse

Dine h√•rde hvidevarer er af m√¶rket Vestfrost, som leverer k√∏le-/fryseskab, opvaskemaskine, ovn og induktionskogeplade med 4 sektioner.

Den flotte keramiske h√•ndvask er placeret over stilrene Dansani-skabe med glatte, hvide overflader, der er lette for dig at vedligeholde. Der medf√∏lger ogs√• en vaskes√∏jle med vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumbler fra Vestfrost. Armaturer i h√•ndvask og bruseniche er fra Grohe.

title: Super nice 2-room apartment in Frederiksberg C -Expats only
description:
The apartment is located at a highly sought after address in Frederiksberg. The apartment can be rented for 1-2 years. No Pets!
The apartment is on the 4th floor. There is access to the apartment via a closed gate and the beautiful courtyard environment. There is an elevator!
The apartment is a large 2 bedroom apartment of 86 m2 and offers a distribution entrance with built-in closets and space for outerwear. From the hallway there is a newer, nice bathroom. The bathroom is in a good size with underfloor heating, shower, built-in IF√ñ hanging toilet and with washer and dryer.
The apartment has a state-of-the-art kitchen living room with the most delicious appliances as well as Quooker Fusion and wine refrigerator.
The apartment has a nice large living room, where there is plenty of space for both dining area and sofa area. From the living room there is access to the balcony with plenty of space to sit and enjoy the afternoon and evening sun.
Furthermore, there is a large bedroom with fitted wardrobes.
There are two balconies ‚Äì one to the northeast at the entrance to the apartment and one to the southwest.
Aconto consumption:
Heating: 560 DKK pr. month
Water: 260 DKK per. month
Internet: 250 DKK pr. month
Broadband is installed via wireless modem from Yousee. The subscription can be taken over.
The apartment is NOT for sharing!! When contacting, please note your phone number !!

The area: Holger Danskes Vej is located centrally in Frederiksberg, close to all the good shopping opportunities, the atmospheric cafe life and the many coffee bars on Falkoner Alle and Godth√•bsvej as well as walking distance to means of transport such as bus and Aksel M√∏llers Have Metro. In addition, close distance to Frederiksberg Center and the cozy Agricultural University Garden ‚Äì a small oasis in the busy city life. Here you will live in a quiet, green and at the same time central area with a short walking distance to virtually all daily necessities. Holger Danske‚Äôs road itself is a quiet road, planted with trees and good parking opportunities. The road is quietly located with one-way traffic.
You can cycle to the metro in five minutes and to the center of Copenhagen in ten minutes. BUS 2A runs towards R√•dhuspladsen, and there is a five-minute walk to the bus stop.

title: Sk√∏n 3-v√¶relses lejlighed i S√∏borg!
description:
BEM√ÜRK AT BILLEDERNE ER FRA VORES PR√òVEBOLIG.

MODERNE BOLIGER I NORDISK DESIGN.
I de nye suver√¶ne lejeboliger i 1 eller 2 plan er der plads til mindre og st√∏rre b√∏rnefamilier. Boligerne varierer mellem 2-4 v√¶relser og 48-102 m2, s√• du kan finde en lejlighed, der passer til dig og din families behov.

Kontrasten mellem det lyse og lette gulv og det r√•, h√•rde betonloft bringer en dynamisk indretning til live, s√• boligen emmer af moderne nordisk design.

Dine nye over- og underskabe fra HTH har en slidst√¶rk, lysegr√• lakering, der ligesom dit badev√¶relse bliver let at holde rent. I overskabene er der installeret LED-spots, der oplyser den flotte bordplade af massiv eg.

De rene linjer spiller nydeligt sammen med indbygningsskabe til k√∏le-/ fryseskab, ovn, emh√¶tte og opvaskemaskine. Armaturet er fra Oras Saga, der er et brugervenligt, robust og alsidigt armatur i moderne, nordisk design.

Dine h√•rde hvidevarer er af m√¶rket Vestfrost, som leverer k√∏le-/fryseskab, opvaskemaskine, ovn og induktionskogeplade med 4 sektioner.

ET ELEGANT BADEV√ÜRELSE I H√òJ KVALITET.
Badev√¶relset er i tr√•d med den h√∏je kvalitet, som kendetegner boligen. P√• gulv og i bruseniche er der matte, m√∏rkegr√• klinker, der elegant spiller sammen med de tilsvarende fliser p√• v√¶ggene.

Det v√¶gh√¶ngte og vandsparende toilet med soft luk fra Villeroy & Boch har indbygningscisterne. Den flotte keramiske h√•ndvask er placeret over stilrene Dansani-skabe med glatte, hvide overflader, der er lette for dig at vedligeholde.

Der medf√∏lger ogs√• en vaskes√∏jle med vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumbler fra Vestfrost. Armaturer i h√•ndvask og bruseniche er fra Grohe.

title: Central modern apartment with own rooftop terrace
description:
Available from June 1, 2025. 

A modern, stylish apartment located at the Harbour side, in central Copenhagen.

Perfect for the small family relocating or expats moving to Copenhagen for a limited time. There is a possibility for extension. 

/The apartment 
It is a two-bedroom apartment with three terraces, including a private rooftop terrace (approx. 60 m2) and the possibility to access two shared rooftop terraces. 

The apartment comes fully furnished with all needed kitchen wear and appliances, and further incl. dishwasher, washing machine, dryer etc. 

The building has elevator included, and it is possible to rent parking in the connected parking garage. 

/The neighbourhood
It is in a quiet neighbourhood within walking distance to "The Little Mermaid", Kastellet, and Kongens Nytorv. ‚Äã‚Äã‚ÄãThere is a opportunity for grocery shopping within 20 meters.

title: Furnished Studio - Ideal for young professionals -  300m from Metro
description:
Welcome to Valby, where you can live in this spacious, fully furnished studio apartment - where functionality meets Danish design. The studio has its own private bathroom & kitchen, and it is fully furnished so you avoid the stress of moving and have everything you need from day one. The studio is located in a building complex buzzing with life, and access to modern, common areas is included in your rent. 

This studio is eligible for rent subsidy (boligst√∏tte), to help tenants reduce their living expenses through government assistance. 

The studio is equipped with: 
‚Ä£ Bed & mattress (120 x 200 cm) 
‚Ä£ Desk 
‚Ä£ Storage cabinet 
‚Ä£ Fully equipped kitchen (oven, hob, fridge, freezer, extractor hood) 
‚Ä£ Private bathroom with shower 

Free access to community amenities: 
‚Ä£ Access to common areas including a lobby with seating and projector, reading room, meeting rooms 
‚Ä£ Roof terrace and courtyard garden 
‚Ä£ Atrium with cozy community atmosphere 
‚Ä£ Laundry room (washing: 20 kr. incl. soap, tumble drying: 15 kr.) 

About the building complex: 
‚Ä£ Located in UMEUS Valby, part of the new Torveporten area

‚Ä£ F√∏tex supermarket 120m away from your doorstep 
‚Ä£ Close to Valby Park, Valby Strand, and other green areas 
‚Ä£ Easy access to the city center (15 min away by metro) and nearby Frederiksberg 
‚Ä£ Close to Intercity train - easy access to Denmark's‚Äô biggest cities: Odense, √Örhus, Aalborg, Frederikshavn. Esbjerg, Herning 

By living in this building complex, you will also enjoy a lively community: 
‚Ä£ Dynamic, youthful environment ideal for building networks and friendships 
‚Ä£ Community manager on-site for support with lease, maintenance, or event planning 

This studio offers a perfect blend of personal comfort and vibrant community life, suited for anyone looking to enjoy a young, energetic living environment.  

The common areas in the building complex are buzzing with life ‚Äì here you can grab a coffee in the lobby, focus on deep work in one of the bookable meeting rooms, or just chill with a projector movie in our indoor cinema hall. While your beautifully designed studio is your personal hideaway, you will also have access to a community of other young people just like you.   

The studio is perfect for young professionals seeking a lively community atmosphere that fosters connections. Yep, that's what it's all about - taking your studio living experience to a whole new level ü§ùüè† Reach out to arrange a viewing!

title: 1-v√¶relses Studiebolig i Valby
description:
Lej en studiebolig i attraktive Valby

Da dette er en studiebolig, kr√¶ves det at man er aktivt studerende for at kunne blive tilbudt boligen.


Dr√∏mmer du om at bo i en studiebolig t√¶t p√• midtbyens mange sp√¶ndende tilbud og muligheder? Med en bolig p√• F√∏lager vil du bo dejligt centralt i en attraktiv og ny bydel i K√∏benhavn.


Flotte boliger til dig som studerende i K√∏benhavn og omegn

Der er i alt 109 flotte studielejligheder i ejendommen. Lejeboligernes st√∏rrelser varierer fra 38 kvm til 54 kvm. Boligerne best√•r af √©t stort rum med fuldt k√∏kken - her er rig mulighed for, at du kan indrette rummene efter din egen personlige stil. Boligerne er fordelt p√• i alt fire etager med forskellige muligheder og udtryk p√• hver etage.



Ejendommens stueplan byder p√• boliger med tilh√∏rende terrasse ud til g√•rdmilj√∏et.



1. og 2. sal byder p√• boliger med fransk altan b√•de med udsigt over den nye bydel Gr√∏ntorvet eller over Svenskerbyen p√• den anden side. 3. sal byder ogs√• p√• boliger med fransk altan eller handicapvenlige boliger med egen udgang til svalegangsaltan med direkte adgang til ejendommens indbydende f√¶lles omdrejningspunkt - den store f√¶lles tagterrasse. Tr√¶nger du til frisk luft, kan du med stor forn√∏jelse s√¶tte dig op p√• denne store lyse f√¶lles tagterrasse.



P√• 1.-3. sal findes f√¶lles opholdsrum, hvor mulighederne er uendelige, hvad enten du vil lave mad sammen med dine naboer i f√¶llesk√∏kkenet, se TV i sofaarrangementet eller blot l√¶se lektier med eller uden den fri wifi, som der findes i rummene. Ejendommens g√•rdmilj√∏ byder p√• f√¶lles gr√∏nne omr√•der samt overd√¶kket cykelparkering i to etager.

Lej en 1-v√¶relses lejlighed i Valby n√¶r offentlig transport, indk√∏b og byliv

Boligerne har sin beliggenhed i en ny og attraktiv bydel i Valby. Her kan du nemt udleve dr√∏mmen om at bo i en af K√∏benhavns nye og inspirerende bydele.

Du vil som lejer bo i g√•afstand til blandt andet Metro, indk√∏bsmuligheder og fitnesscenter. Kun fire minutters gang fra lejligheden vil du n√• til Ny Ellebjerg Station. Stationen kan forbinde dig til resten af K√∏benhavn samt Sj√¶llands eventyrlige oplevelser. Indre By kan du allerede vandre i efter en metrotur p√• kun 13 minutter.

Velkommen til F√∏lager, 2450 K√∏benhavn SV

Ejendommen er opf√∏rt i 2018, s√• du kommer til at flytte ind i en l√¶kker og moderne bolig, der fremst√•r helt ny.

I k√¶lderen findes parkeringsomr√•der b√•de til biler og cykler. Der er derudover depotrum til alle boligerne samt et f√¶lles vaskeri. I stueplanen kan du ogs√• nyde gode at de 18 sm√• niche popup butikker, hvor kreativiteten for varerne n√¶sten ingen ende vil tage.

title: A modern and bright 95 m2 four room apartment from 2005 with a balcony and a basement parking in Bohlendachsvej at Holmen - Christianshavn
description:
A modern and bright 95 m2 four room apartment from 2005 with a balcony and a basement parking in Bohlendachsvej at Holmen - Christianshavn - one of the most charming neighborhoods in Copenhagen, 450 metres from the Royal Opera, a three minutes wail from shopping and fitness and six minutes by bike to Kongens Nytorv.

From the entrance with space to hang outerwear you have access to all of the rooms. There is a combined dining and living room with access to the balcony facing the nice neighborhood. The nice and white kitchen is open to the dining area.

The three rooms can be used as bedrooms, study or guest room.

The bathroom has a shower and is equipped with a washer and a dryer.

In the basement you have a parking place and a storage room.

Available for 3 years from June 1st. for an expat or expat family

title: 2-v√¶relses lejebolig i Herlev
description:
Velkommen til Bakkek√¶ret
√ÖBENT HUS:
Bakkek√¶ret:
Find din nye lejebolig blandt de 445 lejeboliger. Her er et husrum til dig, der har brug for at b√∏rnene f√•r eget v√¶relse. Til parret, der vil have ekstra god plads. Til jer, der vil downsize. Til dem der vil bo alene. Til dem der vil bo sammen.
Frem for alt er der plads til alle livsfaser og dr√∏mme i Bakkek√¶rets f√¶llesskab mellem dig, naboer og naturen.
Boligerne bliver f√¶rdige i 6 etaper og denne bolig ligger i ejendommens femte etape med indflytning 1. juni 2025.
G√•rdrum og f√¶llesskab:
Bakkek√¶rets hjerte er det gr√∏nne bakkedrag i g√•rdrummet, hvor gr√¶sset vokser til, tr√¶erne b√¶rer frugt og urtehaverne kan dyrkes. Her kan b√∏rnene udforske naturen og tumle p√• legepladsen eller du kan nyde en fredelig kop kaffe i en varm solplet.
Med tre orangerier, tagterrasser og et f√¶lleshus p√• 400 m2, er der skabt rum til b√•de alenetid, familietid og hyggetid.
Herlev:
Lige rundt om hj√∏rnet fra Bakkek√¶ret finder du Herlev Bymidte og Herlev Bygade. Her kan du klare hverdagens indk√∏b, men kan ogs√• finde restauranter, t√∏jbutikker, fris√∏r og meget mere. Du kan g√• en tur p√• det lille str√∏g ved Herlev Torv eller bes√∏ge butikkerne i Herlev Bymidte Center. Kun et par minutter fra bymidten ligger ogs√• BIG Shopping, hvor du kan finde bl.a. byggemarked, en biograf og et legeland for de mindste.
Forestil dig at bo et sted, hvor du kan have naturen og alt hvad du skal bruge i hverdagslivet t√¶t p√• ‚Äì og samtidig have K√∏benhavn inden for r√¶kkevidde. Hop p√• cyklen, ind i bilen eller S-toget p√• Herlev Station, og kom let p√• arbejde. G√• en tur i en af byens mange parker eller dyrk outdoor-livet i et af de gr√∏nne naturomr√•der.
Praktisk:
Derudover f√•r du:
- Elevator i bygningen
- Depotrum i k√¶lder eller plint
- Det er muligt at leje en p-plads i k√¶lderen (der er ogs√• el ladepladser)
Det med sm√•t:
- Det er ikke tilladt at st√• i RKI
- K√¶ledyr skal godkendes af udlejer
- Bem√¶rk, at billedmaterialet ikke n√∏dvendigvis stammer fra den p√•g√¶ldende bolig

title: 3-V√ÜRELSES I BALLERUP
description:
Lejlighederne kommer med forskellige planl√∏sninger. Nogle lejligheder har en lille entr√©, og i andre lejligheder tr√¶der man direkte ind i k√∏kken-alrummet. Du f√•r et godt og funktionelt indrettet badev√¶relse med separat bruseniche og vaskes√∏jle med kombineret vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumbler. Alt afh√¶ngig af lejlighedens st√∏rrelse er der 1 til 3 separate v√¶relser udover k√∏kken-alrummet. Der er depotrum tilg√¶ngeligt i n√¶sten alle lejem√•l bortset fra otte boliger, hvor depotrummet er udenfor lejem√•let.

Alle lejlighederne i stueetagen har egen terrasse  omkranset af  lille h√¶k. Ligeledes har alle lejligheder fra 1. sal og op en altan.

H√•rde hvidevarer
Der er alt i h√•rde hvidevarer samt en kombineret vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumbler.

Husdyr
Lejere kan ans√∏ge om tilladelse til at holde indekat og hund p√• adressen. Udekatte er ikke tilladt. Kontakt os for mere information.

Parkering
Der er i alt 129 p-pladser, hvoraf 41 er i parkeringsk√¶lder mens de resterende 88 ligger i terr√¶n. Af de 129 p-pladser er flere handicappladser og pladser forbeholdt el- og hybridbiler.

Elevator
Der er elevator i alle bygninger, som er h√∏jere end 2 etager. . Det vil sige, at nummer 6, 8 og 11 ikke har en elevator, hvorimod resten har.

F√¶lles arealer
Bygningerne danner til sammen rammen om et sk√∏nt omr√•de med gode hyggekroge, plads til at boltre sig samt mulighed for flere aktiviteter og boldspil. Imellem boligerne er der fine stier og opholdsrum med tr√¶er, h√∏je gr√¶sser samt andet vild og blomsterfuld beplantning for at fremme biodiversiteten. Der er ligeledes et b√•nd af marksten langs den prim√¶re sti igennem projektets omr√•de, som skaber en √¶stetisk flot LAR-l√∏sning til opsamling af regnvand. En fin legeplads bliver samlingspunktet for omr√•dets b√∏rn, hvor de kan lege og hygge sig sammen. Der er cykelparkering i alle de tre g√•rdmilj√∏er.

De viste billeder kan v√¶re fra et andet men tilsvarende lejem√•l i samme ejendom. Mindre afvigelser kan derfor forekomme.

You‚Äôll also enjoy a cozy private balcony and access to a quiet, green courtyard.

Situated on a quiet side of Gothersgade, the apartment enjoys a prime location right between N√∏rreport, N√∏rrebro, The Lakes, and the Botanical Garden. description:

.

Lejligheden:

Eksklusivt badev√¶relse med smukke fliser, integreret h√•ndkl√¶det√∏rrer og vaskes√∏jle.

To gode sovev√¶relser mod Amaliegade, begge indrettet med indbyggede skabe, hvor der fra det ene sovev√¶relse er direkte adgang til endnu et badev√¶relse, ligeledes udf√∏rt i smukke fliser.

Fra stuen er der adgang via fire trin op til et sk√∏nt v√¶relse, som nemt kan anvendes til endnu et sovev√¶relse, b√∏rnev√¶relse, stue nummer to, kontor eller lignende. I forbindelse hermed adgang til mindre kammer, som kan indrettes til walk-in, opbevaring eller lille kontorkrog.

Ejendommen:

Denne ejendom, oprindeligt opf√∏rt som erhverv, er n√¶nsomt omdannet til boliger med respekt for dens historiske detaljer. En smuk vindeltrappe forbinder etagerne og giver ejendommen karakter, mens elevatoren sikrer nem adgang. Omr√•det:

Frederiksstaden blev af Frederik den Femte anlagt i 1749. Det var tiden, hvor kongen, adlen og rige k√∏bm√¶nd kappedes om at opf√∏re bygningsv√¶rker med pomp og pragt. Centrum for Frederiksstaden er Amalienborg, og Amaliegade str√¶kker sig mod nord som fornem l√¶ngdeakse. Der var strenge krav til bygningernes arkitektoniske korrespondens, og kongens hofarkitekter Lauritz de Thurah og Nicolai Eigtved stod for planl√¶gning og udf√∏relse af den nye bydel. Dejlig central beliggenhed - t√¶t p√• Kastellet, Amalienborg, St. Kongensgades mange indk√∏bsmuligheder og meget mere.

Bem√¶rk! Billederne kan v√¶re fra en anden tilsvarende bolig, hvorfor , beliggenhed og udsigt kan variere. Materialevalg og kvalitet er den samme for alle boliger i ejendommen. Se plantegningen for indretningen af denne bolig.

title: Modern Frederiksberg Studio with kitchen, loft & private terrace
description:
Welcome to Frederiksberg, where you can live in this spacious, fully furnished studio apartment - where functionality meets Danish design. The studio has its own private bathroom, kitchen loft and terrace, and it is fully furnished so you avoid the stress of moving and have everything you need from day one. The studio is located in a building complex buzzing with life, and access to modern, common areas is included in your rent. Located centrally in the heart of the Frederiksberg hip and classy neighborhood, with plenty of opportunities for a modern, active life. The lively Rantzausgade and V√¶rnedamsvej are both just around the corner - and did we mention it's only 10 min walk from the Lakes? Forum & Nuuks Plads Metro st. are both very close by, and R√•dhuspladsen /City Hall is only a 5 minute away metro-ride. 

*This studio is eligible for rent subsidy (boligst√∏tte), to help tenants reduce their living expenses through government assistance. 


The studio is equipped with: 

‚Ä£ Private bathroom with toilet and a separate shower. A large mirror, 1 shelf for storage and hooks for towels and a shower curtain.  
‚Ä£ Kitchen with oven, fridge, freezer & stove, cabinets with a sink and extractor hood. Prepared with socket for electrical appliances  
‚Ä£ Loft with bed 
‚Ä£ Terrace (6 sqm) 
‚Ä£ Working desk (60 cm x 100 cm) + 2 stools.
‚Ä£ 3 tall cabinets including shelves, hanger bar and 1 mirror 
‚Ä£ Bed, including a mattress and a mattress topper (140 cm x 200 cm) 
‚Ä£ Wall-mounted shelves, a wall lamp, ceiling lamp, blackout curtain and hooks for outerwear. 

Free access to community amenities: 
‚Ä£ Access to common areas including a lobby, reading room, meeting rooms 
‚Ä£ Free access to the fully equipped fitness (in-house) 
‚Ä£ Roof terrace and courtyard garden 
‚Ä£ Laundry room (washing: 20 kr. incl. soap, tumble drying: 15 kr.)  

About the building complex: 
‚Ä£ Located in UMEUS Frederiksberg, on B√ºlowsvej 
‚Ä£ Proximity to Forum Metro (700 meters away) - 5 min to Copenhagen City Centre 
‚Ä£ Frederiksberg Centre 1 km away from your doorstep 
‚Ä£ Restaurants, parks, caf√©s and plenty of shopping around 

Community Life: 
‚Ä£ Dynamic, youthful environment ideal for building networks and friendships 
‚Ä£ Community manager on-site for support with lease, maintenance, or event planning 

This studio offers a perfect blend of personal comfort and vibrant community life, suited for anyone looking to enjoy a young, energetic living environment.  

The common areas in the building complex are buzzing with life ‚Äì here you can grab a coffee in the lobby, focus on deep work in one of the bookable meeting rooms, train in the fully-equipped gym or just chill on the rooftop with views over Copenhagen. While your beautifully designed studio is your personal hideaway, you will also have access to a community of other young people just like you.   

The studio is perfect for young professionals seeking a lively community atmosphere that fosters connections. Yep, that's what it's all about - taking your studio living experience to a whole new level ü§ùüè† Reach out to arrange a viewing!

title: Studio for 1 person - Modern Housing in Copenhagen Nordhavn
description:
This spacious modern studio for 1 person, is located right by the water in Nordhavn. When staying at us, you will get access to all the facilities that you will need. 

What‚Äôs inside? 

Private bathroom with toilet and a separate shower. A large mirror, 1 shelf for storage and hooks for towels and a shower curtain.  

Kitchenette; Cabinets with a sink, extractor hood, oven, stove and refrigerator. Prepared with socket for electrical appliances  

Working desk (60 cm x 100 cm) 

3 tall cabinets including shelves, hanger bar and 1 mirror 

Bed with 2 pull-out drawers, including a mattress and a mattress topper (120 cm x 200 cm) 

The studio further comes with wall-mounted shelves, a wall lamp, a hook for a ceiling lamp of your own, roller blinds and hooks for outerwear. 

On top of that, you will get access to:‚ÄØ‚ÄØ 
- Fitness: fully equipped gym included in the rent 
- Rooftop terrace‚ÄØ 
- Laundry room‚ÄØ(paid over rent)‚ÄØ 
- Group rooms you can book‚ÄØthrough our app 
- Study hall‚ÄØ‚ÄØ 
- Nordhavn Metro is close by  
- Community Manager on site to help with all questions 
- Events ‚Äì you can take part in our social events and the running club and creative club.

About: 

The dorm offers co-living in Copenhagen. Located centrally in the district of Nordhavn with plenty of opportunities to enjoy an active life.
Just around the corner you will find caf√©s, restaurants and supermarkets. Or go and visit the cinema or the rooftop gym across the street. 

The heart of the dorm is the community: the majority of the residents live across 14 communal kitchens. The communal kitchens are designed to create the best framework for communities. Whether you want to cook together or have a movie night, grab a beer or play board games together - this is where it happens.

title: 2 v√¶r. lejlighjed p√• 98 kvm.
description:
This beautifully designed apartment is available for rent either partially furnished or unfurnished, depending on your preference. The lease period is for 12 months with the potential for a lease extension.

Located in the preserved Mineral Water Factory building from the 1920s, the apartment is part of Carlsberg City's transformation into a vibrant residential area. The renovation process adhered to strict architectural standards, leading to the selection of Dorte Mandrup Architects to design the 20 new apartments.

At the top of the building, you'll be welcomed by a charming, landscaped atrium courtyard, where your private terrace is situated right in front of the apartment. Stepping inside, you'll find polished concrete floors and a joiner kitchen, featuring a kitchen island and solid Miele appliances. Next to the kitchen is a spacious and bathroom, complete with toilet, shower, and a combined washer and dryer unit.

The open-plan living area is perfect for both dining and relaxation, with access to the building‚Äôs shared polishing platform. On the upper mezzanine level, you will be greeted by solid oak plank flooring, high ceilings, and a bright, airy atmosphere ‚Äî ideal for a bedroom or home office.

The home features underfloor heating throughout the whole flat, and also the possibility to rent a parking space in the basement with EV charging. This flat combines the charm of a historic building with granite plinth and the like, while also offering the convenience of a modern one.

Til lejligheden h√∏rer et opbevaringsrum, der er elevator i opgangen, cykelparkering og mulighed for leje af parkeringsplads i k√¶lderen.
Til sidst opfylder boligen energikravene til opn√•else af energim√¶rkning A2015. Det lave varmeforbrug opn√•s ved at anvende optimal isolering i yderv√¶ggene, √∏get t√¶thed i konstruktionerne, varmegenindvindingsanl√¶g og 2-lags energiruder. Ventilations- og varmeanl√¶gget sikrer et optimalt indeklima, idet luften renses gennem filtre og luftfugtigheden s√¶nkes.

title: VELKOMMEN TIL F√ÜLLEDBY
description:
Her opf√∏rer vi 71 lejligheder i holdbare materialer med udsigt til Amager F√¶lleds smukke natur. F√¶lledby er et byudviklingsprojekt beliggende i K√∏benhavn, hvor der sigtes mod at skabe en ny og sp√¶ndende bydel.

Boligtyper

Boligerne C6~ byder p√• en r√¶kke forskellige boligtyper fra to til fem v√¶relser, som alle er opf√∏rt af kvalitetsmaterialer. Alle boliger f√•r egne altaner ‚Äì eller terrasser i stueetagerne ‚Äì med udsigt til b√•de naturen og livet i de lokale gader omkring bygningen. Her skaber vi rammen om den hjemlige hygge med l√¶kre lysindfald og en gennemt√¶nkt disponering af rum og inventar, der passer til b√•de sm√• og store familier eller til singlelivet.

Infrastruktur

F√¶lledby vil v√¶re godt forbundet med resten af K√∏benhavn via offentlig transport, cykelstier og veje. Dette g√∏r det nemt for beboerne at pendle og bev√¶ge sig rundt i byen.


Omr√•det ligger kun 10 minutters cykeltur fra Islands Brygge med sit popul√¶re kulturhus og havnebad. Herfra er du hurtigt inde p√• Fisketorvet eller i K√∏dbyen med sine mange spisesteder og specialbutikker. Du kan ogs√• tage enten cyklen eller metroen mod nord til musikoplevelser i DR Koncerthuset, eller bes√∏ge Bella Kvarter, som ligger 10 minutters gang mod syd, hvor Bella Arena og Bella Center byder p√• koncerter eller messer i l√∏bet af √•ret som fx den popul√¶re Bogmesse. Tager du et metrostop l√¶ngere mod syd finder du et af K√∏benhavns st√∏rste koncertsteder, Royal Arena, og tager du et stop mere, st√•r du p√• kanten af Kalvebod F√¶lled og et stenkast fra omr√•dets popul√¶re Naturcenter Amager. Herfra str√¶kker Naturpark Amagers √•bne vidder sig langt mod syd og indbyder til lange g√•ture i b√•de eng og skov eller langs vandet.

Forbehold

Vi g√∏r opm√¶rksom p√•, at interi√∏r- og eksteri√∏rbilleder af F√¶lledby og ejendommen C6 er 3D-visualiseringer. 3D-visu ‚Äì aliseringer tilstr√¶ber at vise bebyggelsen s√• n√∏jagtigt som muligt. Der tages forbehold for, at der p√• disse billeder i salgsmaterialet er gengivet genstande, overflader, materialer, udstyr og indretning, som ikke svarer n√∏jagtigt til det, der leveres. Dette g√∏r sig tillige g√¶ldende for nabobygninger, g√•rdmilj√∏, gangbroer, bel√¶gninger, udend√∏rs inventar mm., idet disse er angivet ud fra foreliggende oplysninger. Der kan ske √¶ndringer i det endelige udtryk, materialevalg og geometri. Bel√¶gninger, tr√¶er og beplantninger vises ikke n√∏dvendigvis som det vil se ud ved afleveringen af boligen, da beplantning har en etableringsperiode, og derfor f√∏rst vil vokse til med √•rene. V√¶sentlige afvigelser kan forekomme blandt andet p√• grund af myndighedskrav og byggesagsbehandling

title: Lejlighed i bedste beliggenhed med stor terrasse

title: Apartment in central and hip N√∏rrebro with balcony
description:
Looking for short term renters from 20th of march ( one or two months, while I am out traveling myself.
 


Welcome to this completely newly renovated Copenhagen apartment, located in the heart of vibrant N√∏rrebro. This spacious, modern home has been carefully renovated to combine contemporary comfort with the charm of a classic Copenhagen apartment, featuring high ceilings and timeless details. The brand new kitchen is equipped with the latest high-end appliances, including a dishwasher, washing machine, and more. The large living area offers a comfortable sofa, perfect for relaxing, as well as plenty of space to eat, work, or unwind.

With a dedicated area for working and a peaceful, quiet environment, this apartment is perfect for longer stays, especially for those who need to work during their visit. You‚Äôll find everything you need to settle in and be productive while enjoying the comfort of your temporary home.

Enjoy a huge balcony where you can take in peaceful Copenhagen mornings, afternoons, and vibrant Copenhagen nights, all while sipping a glass of wine, enjoying a cup of coffee, or reading a book.

The apartment also boasts a newly renovated bathroom with a separate shower room, a rare feature in traditional Copenhagen apartments.

With one of the best locations in the city, you're just steps away from Rantzausgade, in the heart of N√∏rrebro. This area is known for its trendy cafes, restaurants, natural wine bars, and craft beer spots. Just a few places to mention: K√∏lsters Tolv Haner, Baka de Busk, and Coffee Collective. You can also enjoy peaceful walks in the nearby Assistens Cemetery, a beautiful spot year-round. The apartment is tucked away on a side street off Rantzausgade, ensuring you won‚Äôt be disturbed by any noise during your stay. Plus, with S√∏erne, Frederiksberg, and Vesterbro just a short walk away, you‚Äôll be right in the middle of it all. You can even complete the "Copenhagen experience" by borrowing a bike just around the corner!

I love helping my guests have the best experience, so feel free to ask me anything! I'm a passionate traveler myself, and the only thing I ask is that you take good care of this beautiful apartment while enjoying your stay!

description:
Om boligen: 

 

 Denne unikke 5-v√¶relses lejlighed i Tingbjerg byder p√• en charmerende planl√∏sning, der giver masser af muligheder for at tilpasse hjemmet til dine behov. Lejligheden har en lille, men hyggelig stue, perfekt til afslapning og sociale stunder, mens de √∏vrige rum giver fleksibilitet til b√•de sovev√¶relser, kontor eller opbevaring. 

 

Med fem v√¶relser i alt er dette den perfekte bolig for den, der √∏nsker ekstra plads til b√•de privatliv og f√¶lles aktiviteter. K√∏kkenet er funktionelt og √•bner op til de √∏vrige rum, hvilket skaber en god forbindelse mellem dagligdagens aktiviteter. 

 

Lejligheden har et moderne badev√¶relse og gulvvarme i hele boligen, som sikrer en behagelig temperatur √•ret rundt. 

 

Beliggenheden er ideel med t√¶t p√• offentlig transport, indk√∏b og gr√∏nne omr√•der, hvilket giver b√•de ro og bekvemmelighed i hverdagen. 

 

Bem√¶rk venligst, at billederne kan v√¶re fra en anden bolig, hvorfor indretning, beliggenhed og udsigt kan variere. Materialevalg og kvalitet er den samme for alle boliger i ejendommen. Se plantegningen for indretningen af denne bolig. 

 

 

Ejendommen: 

Tingbjerget er opf√∏rt med de karakteristiske gule teglsten og er designet med stor respekt for den oprindelige arkitektur, som Steen Ejlers Rasmussen skabte i 1940‚Äôerne. Det er en moderne fortolkning af de visioner, der dengang var med til at pr√¶ge den s√¶rlige og unikke bydel. Ejendommens g√•rd har et smukt gr√∏nt omr√•de, der vil blive beplantet med 600 tr√¶er. Der er desuden en naturlegeplads til b√∏rnene, et f√¶llesrum for beboerne, samt faciliteter som en b√•lplads og en parkourbane. 

 

 

Omr√•det: 

Tingbjerg er en livlig bydel t√¶t p√• K√∏benhavns centrum, hvor du kan opleve b√•de det pulserende byliv og natursk√∏nne omgivelser. Med nem adgang til offentlig transport er det hurtigt at komme rundt i byen. title: Fully Furnished Hotel Apartment
description:
Fully furnished exclusive apartment with plenty space and catering for four persons.  

Easy and ready to move in with fully functional kitchen dishwater, washing machine, dryer and all the utilities and kitchen equipment you need for a long-term stay.

It comes with elevated king size bed in master bedroom, two single beds that can be turned into a double king size, plenty of storage and closet space, large Livingroom sofa and dining area for 6 persons.

You find everything you need from bed linen, towels, TV, high speed Internet, etc.

The location is in an exclusive, cozy, and super convenient neighborhood with all the groceries stores, bakery, restaurants, cafes, salons, etc.

There is free parking all around the building, train station is 6 min walk, bus 1 min walk that can take you into central Copenhagen within 20 minutes.

Within 5 K you have beaches, harbor, beautiful parks, shopping center with cafes, restaurants, and a very nice cinema.

You are welcome to see the apartment and meet with the current tenants.

High speed wifi and TV package is included in rent.
