title: Bo i Herlev - 4-v√¶relses lejebolig
description:
Velkommen til Bakkek√¶ret!
Deleboliger tillades
√ÖBENT HUS:
Bakkek√¶ret:
Boligen ligger i en ny ejendom best√•ende af 445 lejeboliger.
Her er et husrum til dig, der har brug for at b√∏rnene f√•r eget v√¶relse. Til parret, der vil have ekstra god plads. Til jer, der vil downsize. Til dem der vil bo alene. Til dem der vil bo sammen.
Frem for alt er der plads til alle livsfaser og dr√∏mme i Bakkek√¶rets f√¶llesskab mellem dig, naboer og naturen.
Boligerne bliver f√¶rdige i 6 etaper og denne bolig ligger i ejendommens anden etape, som er f√¶rdig.
G√•rdrum og f√¶llesskab:
Bakkek√¶rets hjerte er det gr√∏nne bakkedrag i g√•rdrummet, hvor gr√¶sset vokser til, tr√¶erne b√¶rer frugt og urtehaverne kan dyrkes. Her kan b√∏rnene udforske naturen og tumle p√• legepladsen eller du kan nyde en fredelig kop kaffe i en varm solplet.
Med tre orangerier, tagterrasser og et f√¶lleshus p√• 400 m2, er der skabt rum til b√•de alenetid, familietid og hyggetid.
Herlev:
Lige rundt om hj√∏rnet fra Bakkek√¶ret finder du Herlev Bymidte og Herlev Bygade. Her kan du klare hverdagens indk√∏b, men kan ogs√• finde restauranter, t√∏jbutikker, fris√∏r og meget mere. Du kan g√• en tur p√• det lille str√∏g ved Herlev Torv eller bes√∏ge butikkerne i Herlev Bymidte Center. Kun et par minutter fra bymidten ligger ogs√• BIG Shopping, hvor du kan finde bl.a. byggemarked, en biograf og et legeland for de mindste.
Forestil dig at bo et sted, hvor du kan have naturen og alt hvad du skal bruge i hverdagslivet t√¶t p√• ‚Äì og samtidig have K√∏benhavn inden for r√¶kkevidde. Hop p√• cyklen, ind i bilen eller S-toget p√• Herlev Station, og kom let p√• arbejde. G√• en tur i en af byens mange parker eller dyrk outdoor-livet i et af de gr√∏nne naturomr√•der.
Praktisk:
Derudover f√•r du:
- Elevator i bygningen
- Depotrum i k√¶lder eller plint
- Det er muligt at leje en p-plads i k√¶lderen (der er ogs√• el ladepladser)
Det med sm√•t:
- Det er ikke tilladt at st√• i RKI

In continuation of Gentoftegade, Kongelysvej, a small blind road, is well protected from Lyngbyvejens traffic and noise, but at the same time close to everything, including buses, trains, shopping and post office. The property is from 1937 and it was refurbished from basement to roof in 2003/4 with new features of condominiums. New Paint from 2025.  

The apartment is 119 m2 and 4 rooms are easily and functionally disposed, with a modern and attractive touch. There is high ceilings in all rooms, ash parked on the floors and underfloor heating throughout. From the entrance you go through one glass door into it approx. 45 m2 large living room, which is elegantly open in open contact with it modern kitchen made with Hanstholm elements and mahogany countertops. The living room that is The natural focal point of the apartment is connected to the large southwest facing balcony of about 10 m2 , the bedroom with fitted wardrobes and one of the 2 children\'s rooms. The another children\'s room, as well as the large bathroom with granite table accessed from the entrance hall. 

All White goods included (stove, oven, fridge, freezer, dishwasher, all in one washing machine and tumble dryer). The apartment has its own car park and own cellar, in addition to shared facilities basement. The property is surrounded by beech hedges and linden trees.

As landlord, I have hosted several tenants over the years, always with mutual respect, and all have left the house satisfied. Here‚Äôs what one of my former tenants had to say:

"Once again, I would like to express my heartfelt gratitude for your unwavering support over the years and for being such a kind and friendly landlord. "

title: Spacious 4 rooms new 128 m2 apartment
description:
The apartment is on the 11th floor with a south-west facing living room and a spacious balcony - it gives a beautiful view directly over the city and parks!

You enter a beautiful and spacious entrance hall, which gives access to your large living room with an open kitchen. 
The entrance also gives access to a guest toilet/bathroom and a spacious bedroom that could be a guest bedroom or bed room for grown up kids. 
The master bedroom comes with a walk-in closet and attached toilet/bathroom and washing machine & dryer.
In addition, there is a small room besides master bedroom, which could be used as a child room or study/work room or simply as an extension of the living room. 

The area is surrounded by beautiful parks and gardens for a walk, jog, or a family picnic - JC Jacobsens Have, Enghave Parken, S√∏ndermarken, and Frederiksberg Have.

For families with children, there are many good children institutions right in the backyard and the famous European School Copenhagen is at a walkable distance. There are lots of wonderful playgrounds, free time activity centers for children, sports/fitness centers nearby. Copenhagen Zoo is like 15-20 minutes walk from the apartment - yes, we could go on.

There are 3 big supermarkets within 2 minutes walk. Resturants, rooftop bars, cafes, bakeries, spa, shops are all located within 5 minutes walk. 

The apartment location is super convenient, you can easily take S-Train (Carlsberg Byen Station), Buses, and Metro-train (Enghave Plads Metro). Within 5 minutes you can reach Central Train station and Tivoli. 

The apartment comes with a big storage room in the basement. 
There is paid Car parking available very conveniently under the apartment tower. 

The apartment is rented out for a maximum of 24 months (with a possibility to renew), but less duration can also be agreed.

his exclusive 129m2 apartment is located on the 1st floor of Kjeldahl House, which is located in an attractive location in Carlsberg Byen.  Carslebrg Byen offers a broad variate of cafes, restaurants, shopping possibilities and and in walking distance to the S-train and metro. 

The building was build in 2021, is accessible through an elevator and is the ideal apartment for a family looking for comfort and space. The floor plan has a large living space with an open kitchen + 4 additional (bed)rooms, 2 modern bathrooms, a balcony and a unique small terrace overlooking a small, shared grass area.
The apartment gets a lot of light, has exclusive herringbone floors and the kitchen is equipped with high end equipment from Miele and a Quooker. 

The apartment is unfurnished. Initial rental period is up to 2 years, with possibility to extend.

Pets and smoking is NOT allowed.

title: 3 v√¶relses lejlighed p√• Islands Brygge i K√∏benhavn S udlejes
description:
Gemini er latin og betyder tvillinger, og det giver jo meget god mening, n√•r man ser p√• den gamle fr√∏silo p√• Islands Brygge. Gemini Residence, kaldes siloen i dag, som nok er mere siamesiske tvillinger end bare tvillinger, for siloerne i den gamle sojakagefabrik fletter sig ind i hinanden i et arkitektonisk mesterv√¶rk. 84 lejligheder er her, alle bygget uden p√• siloerne, og de kunne ikke ligge bedre i deres eget 8-tal lige ved Bryggebroen og lige over for Fisketorvet.¬†¬†
Alle 143 m2 er vendt mod vandet. Det samme er terrassen, der er lang som lejligheden og har sol fra morgen til aften. Gemini Residence stod f√¶rdig i 2005. Det indvendige af 8-tallet er en tom skal med foyer, trapper og elevator, og det hele ligger under et gennemsigtigt tag. Det er nyt√¶nkning, der vil noget. Kvarteret med den gamle sojakagefabrik er omd√∏bt til Havnestad, hvor en del af de gamle bygninger enten er restaureret eller ombygget. Gemini Residence, Pressesiloen, Zeppelinerhallen og Wennbergsiloen er nogle af dem. 
De er alle b√∏rn af et slidt, industrielt omr√•de, men Islands Brygge har de sidste snart 25 √•r udviklet sig til det mest hippe og eftertragtede kvarter. Fra at vende ryggen til vandet, vender det i dag krop og ansigt mod K√∏benhavn p√• den anden side af vandet. Kreativ byplanl√¶gning med havnebad og promenadeliv g√∏r, at Bryggen og Havnestad i dag st√•r som et raffineret miks af moderne byliv med n√¶rmilj√∏, caf√©er og l√¶kre butikker. Byens bedste kulturtilbud er lige p√• den anden side af vandet. Bryggen har rammerne, som med broer og havnebus forbinder det bedste af alt. 
Ledige P-pladser er der ikke mange af p√• Bryggen, men som lejer f√∏lger der en parkeringsplads med. Den ligger under ejendommen med elevator op til lejligheden. Det er ikke biler, der dominerer Bryggen, det er cykler og ladcykler derimod, p√• cykelstier med indk√∏bsposer, b√∏rn og k√¶rester som uskyldsrene passagerer p√• ladet.
‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
Gemini is Latin and means twins, and it makes a lot of sense when you look at the old seed silo at Islands Brygge. Gemini Residence, as the silo is called today, is probably more Siamese twins than just twins, because the silos in the old soy cake factory intertwine in an architectural masterpiece. There are 84 apartments here, all built on the outside of the silos, and they couldn‚Äôt be better located right by Bryggebroen and right across from Fisketorvet.
All 143 m2 face the water. So does the terrace, which is as long as the apartment and has sun from morning to evening. Gemini Residence was completed in 2005. The inside of the silos is an empty shell with a foyer, stairs and elevator, and it‚Äôs all under a transparent roof. It‚Äôs innovation that matters. The neighborhood with the old soy cake factory has been renamed Havnestad, where some of the old buildings have either been restored or rebuilt. 
in the last 25 years Islands Brygge has developed into the hippest and most sought-after neighborhood. From turning its back on the water, it now faces Copenhagen on the other side of the water. Creative urban planning with a harbor bath and promenade means that Bryggen and Havnestad today stand as a refined mix of modern city life with local environment, cafes and delicious shops. The city‚Äôs best cultural offerings are just on the other side of the water. Bryggen has the framework that, with bridges and the harbor bus, connects the best of everything.
There are not many vacant parking spaces at Bryggen, but as a tenant, a parking space is included. It is located under the property with an elevator up to the apartment.

description:

Tager du et metrostop l√¶ngere mod syd finder du et af K√∏benhavns st√∏rste koncertsteder, Royal Arena, og tager du et stop mere, st√•r du p√• kanten af Kalvebod F√¶lled og et stenkast fra omr√•dets popul√¶re Naturcenter Amager. Forbehold

Vi g√∏r opm√¶rksom p√•, at interi√∏r- og eksteri√∏rbilleder af F√¶lledby og ejendommen C6 er 3D-visualiseringer. 3D-visu ‚Äì aliseringer tilstr√¶ber at vise bebyggelsen s√• n√∏jagtigt som muligt. Der tages forbehold for, at der p√• disse billeder i salgsmaterialet er gengivet genstande, overflader, materialer, udstyr og indretning, som ikke svarer n√∏jagtigt til det, der leveres. Dette g√∏r sig tillige g√¶ldende for nabobygninger, g√•rdmilj√∏, gangbroer, bel√¶gninger, udend√∏rs inventar mm., idet disse er angivet ud fra foreliggende oplysninger. Der kan ske √¶ndringer i det endelige udtryk, materialevalg og geometri. Bel√¶gninger, tr√¶er og beplantninger vises ikke n√∏dvendigvis som det vil se ud ved afleveringen af boligen, da beplantning har en etableringsperiode, og derfor f√∏rst vil vokse til med √•rene. title: Spacious Furnished Studio 400m from Nordhavn Metro (Studio XL w. Kitchen)
description:
üè† Welcome to Nordhavn, where you can live in this spacious, fully furnished studio apartment - where functionality meets Danish design. The studio has its own private bathroom & kitchen, and it is fully furnished so you avoid the stress of moving and have everything you need from day one. The studio is located in a building complex buzzing with life, and access to modern, common areas is included in your rent. Located centrally in the district of Nordhavn with plenty of opportunities for a modern, active life - you can swim in the harbor baths nearby, go to a caf√© or visit the BigBio Cinema just around the corner. Situated in the vibrant Nordhavn neighborhood, this area boasts an array of shops and cafes, with the convenience of a Rema supermarket just a short 300-meter stroll away. R√•dhuspladsen /City Hall is only a 10 minute away metro-ride. 

*This studio is eligible for rent subsidy (boligst√∏tte), to help tenants reduce their living expenses through government assistance. 

The studio is equipped with: 
‚óÜ one bed with 2 pull-out drawers, including a mattress and a mattress topper (120 cm x 200 cm) 
‚óÜ desk (60 cm x 100 cm) 
‚óÜ storage cabinet 
‚óÜ wall-mounted shelving 
‚óÜ ceiling lamp 
‚óÜ roller blinds 
‚óÜ wardrobe with a mirror inside 
‚óÜ fully equipped kitchen (oven, fridge & a small freezer compartment and kitchen cupboard with an extractor fan) 
‚óÜ private bathroom with toilet and a separate shower. A large mirror, 1 shelf for storage and hooks for towels and a shower curtain.    


Free access to shared areas in the building complex: 
‚óÜ access to common lobby, reading room, bookable meeting rooms 
‚óÜ free access to the fully equipped fitness (in-house) 
‚óÜ roof terrace and courtyard garden 
‚óÜ laundry room (washing: 20 kr. incl. soap, tumble drying: 15 kr.) 

About the building complex: 
‚óÜ Located in UMEUS Nordhavn, on Helsinkigade 
‚óÜ Proximity to Nordhavn Metro (400 meters away) - 10 min to Copenhagen City Centre 
‚óÜ Rema supermarket 300m away from your doorstep 
‚óÜ 300m away from Sandkaj Harbour bath, where the boardwalk, the caf√©s and bathing guests create a lovely beach vibe. 

Live in a place with a wonderful community: 
‚óÜ Dynamic, youthful environment ideal for building networks and friendships 
‚óÜ Community manager on-site for support with lease, maintenance, or event planning 

This studio offers a perfect blend of personal comfort and vibrant community life, suited for anyone looking to enjoy a young, energetic living environment.  
The common areas in the building complex are buzzing with life ‚Äì here you can grab a coffee in the lobby, focus on deep work in one of the bookable meeting rooms, train in the fully-equipped gym or just chill on the rooftop with views over the water. While your beautifully designed studio is your personal hideaway, you will also have access to a community of other young people just like you.   

The studio is perfect for young professionals seeking a lively community atmosphere that fosters connections. Yep, that's what it's all about - taking your studio living experience to a whole new level ü§ùüè† Reach out to arrange a viewing! 

*Note: there is only 1 bed in this studio, suitable for couples if 2 tenants occupy it.

title: VELKOMMEN TIL F√ÜLLEDBY
description:

Tager du et metrostop l√¶ngere mod syd finder du et af K√∏benhavns st√∏rste koncertsteder, Royal Arena, og tager du et stop mere, st√•r du p√• kanten af Kalvebod F√¶lled og et stenkast fra omr√•dets popul√¶re Naturcenter Amager. Herfra str√¶kker Naturpark Amagers √•bne vidder sig langt mod syd og indbyder til lange g√•ture i b√•de eng og skov eller langs vandet.

Forbehold

Vi g√∏r opm√¶rksom p√•, at interi√∏r- og eksteri√∏rbilleder af F√¶lledby og ejendommen C6 er 3D-visualiseringer. 3D-visu ‚Äì aliseringer tilstr√¶ber at vise bebyggelsen s√• n√∏jagtigt som muligt. Der tages forbehold for, at der p√• disse billeder i salgsmaterialet er gengivet genstande, overflader, materialer, udstyr og indretning, som ikke svarer n√∏jagtigt til det, der leveres. Dette g√∏r sig tillige g√¶ldende for nabobygninger, g√•rdmilj√∏, gangbroer, bel√¶gninger, udend√∏rs inventar mm., idet disse er angivet ud fra foreliggende oplysninger. Bel√¶gninger, tr√¶er og beplantninger vises ikke n√∏dvendigvis som det vil se ud ved afleveringen af boligen, da beplantning har en etableringsperiode, og derfor f√∏rst vil vokse til med √•rene. title: Stunning Copenhagen apartment with amazing water view
description:
Available from: 1/11-2024

This is one of the best water views over Copenhagen. This 6th floor apartment offers a generous 93 m2 living space split in two bedrooms, a hallway, an open kitchen and living room and one large bathroom. 

A high quality kitchen with Gaggenau kitchen hardware, Dombracht fixtures in the bath and quality hard wood floors To top it all off you have floor to ceiling windows that brings you to your combined 29 m2 balcony with planted flower beds that are automatically watered by a clever rainwater reuse system. You will find access to the balcony from all living rooms of the apartment. 

The building has been awarded with one of the highest climate certifications, DGNB Gold. 

Surrounding the building you will find plenty of shops, restaurants, play areas and a beach that is one of the hidden treasures of Copenhagen in the summer months. 

We are renting the apartment out 1-2 year with possibility for extension.

Feel free to reach out in case you would like some more information.

Har i sp√∏rgsm√•l, kontakt mig venligst.

E N G E L S K 

Lovely fully furnished apartment in an attractive property on 2 levels of 120 sq m. is for subletting for a shorter period min. 1 month and max. 6 months.

The apartment is available by arrangement.

Do you need an apartment in beautiful surroundings in Gentofte Municipality for a shorter or longer period, min. 1 month and max. 6 months? This is the right apartment, and you only need to bring your personal belongings, as the apartment contains all furnishings, bedding, linen, etc.

There is also free parking and internet at the property.

The monthly rent is DKK 25.000,- plus consumption of water + heating + electricity.

There is free internet and TV signal

The apartment is rented for a period from a minimum of 1 month, and a maximum of 6 months. all by agreement, and will be suitable for Danish/Foreign companies that need housing for employees, as well as insurance companies that need to rehouse a family, or others who need an apartment for a shorter period.

The apartment is located in Gentofte, on an attractive residential street, within walking distance of Gentofte S√∏ & Nymosen. The property also has a view of the city and is close to Greater Copenhagen. With S-train to Greater Copenhagen in 17 minutes.

The apartment is on the 2nd floor, and contains a living room, dining room, 2 bedrooms, small kitchen, and large outdoor terrace, fully furnished with rattan furniture, etc.

Large, beautiful bathroom with underfloor heating, washing machine, dryer, etc.

The kitchen has a stove, dishwasher, microwave, coffee maker, fridge/freezer, and all cutlery, etc.

The apartment is fully furnished, and there is also a large flat screen TV, with Netflix, Disney, etc.

In the bedrooms there are 2 large double beds, + cot and high chair 0-2 years.

There is also an extra sofa bed with space for 2 people on the 2nd floor.
Thus, there are sleeping places for a total of up to max. 6 people

In the living room there are 2 leather sofas, sideboard, lamps, coffee table and much more.

In the dining room there is a dining table with 6 chairs, wardrobe etc.

The apartment is located in a beautiful property with half-timbering and high ceilings with an area of ‚Äã‚Äãapprox. 120 sq m. on 2 floors.

As mentioned, the apartment is fully furnished and ready to move into.
The only thing you need is your personal belongings.

The apartment can be rented for a short period of min. 1 month and max. 6 months. depending on your needs.

The apartment is on 2 levels, (1st + 2nd floor), and has a great view of Gentofte and the surrounding area.

It is only a few minutes' walk to the S-Train and buses. Several supermarkets in the area as well as several nurseries, kindergartens and several schools.

Distance to Gentofte Hospital, less than 2 km. Lyngby DTU, about 5 km.

Copenhagen is 9 km from Gentofte, and Kastrup Airport 16 km. from the property.

If you have any questions, please contact me.
